rows.label: qst650314_msg0001
rows.name:
Tell us all your problems.
We're here to help!

rows.label: qst650314_msg0002
rows.name:
Well met, Special
Inquisitor and companions.

rows.label: qst650314_msg0003
rows.name:
You are familiar with
the Chansagh Wastes?

rows.label: qst650314_msg0004
rows.name: Naturally.

rows.label: qst650314_msg0005
rows.name:
Some aggressive monsters have settled
down there in recent months. Our men
are struggling to keep them in check.

rows.label: qst650314_msg0006
rows.name: Sounds rough.

rows.label: qst650314_msg0007
rows.name:
You want us to pay them a
visit and sort things out?

rows.label: qst650314_msg0008
rows.name:
Well no, that was never
our intention...

rows.label: qst650314_msg0009
rows.name:
But if you're offering, we
wouldn't say no to your support.

rows.label: qst650314_msg0010
rows.name: Right on!

rows.label: qst650314_msg0011
rows.name: Kamuya... A word.

rows.label: qst650314_msg0012
rows.name:
Sorry Meleph, I know I'm
overstepping. But we can't
just let this rest, can we?

rows.label: qst650314_msg0013
rows.name: I suppose. And yet...

rows.label: qst650314_msg0014
rows.name:
The wastes are an unhospitable
place. Only the most seasoned of
Drivers are fit to set foot there...

rows.label: qst650314_msg0015
rows.name:
Very well. We will be
glad to assist you.

rows.label: qst650314_msg0016
rows.name: Really? That's wonderful news!

rows.label: qst650314_msg0017
rows.name:
Then as sergeant of the 8th Decade, I
would enlist your help to dispatch
Organl Griffox in the Chansagh Wastes.

rows.label: qst650314_msg0018
rows.name: 第5十人隊隊長として ×××の○○○の討伐をお願いします

rows.label: qst650314_msg0019
rows.name:
Sergeant of the 1st Decade here.
Humbly requesting that you subjugate
Berserker Mammut too, Ma'am!

rows.label: qst650314_msg0020
rows.name: Urgh...

rows.label: qst650314_msg0021
rows.name: Come on, keep 'em comin'!

rows.label: qst650314_msg0022
rows.name:
All right then... On behalf of the
7th Decade, I would entreat you
to defeat the Tempest Pterix!

rows.label: qst650314_msg0023
rows.name:
The Sarabashi Ropl are proving a handful
as well. The 3rd Decade would appreciate
it if you could control them!

rows.label: qst650314_msg0024
rows.name:
Add the Growsa Aspar to your
list too. 9th Decade orders.

rows.label: qst650314_msg0025
rows.name:
What about the 5th Decade's
gathering mission?

rows.label: qst650314_msg0026
rows.name:
Ah, that's right, we still
haven't got round to that...

rows.label: qst650314_msg0027
rows.name:
Think you could pick up
some Nitrotoluite while
you're out on your hunt?

rows.label: qst650314_msg0028
rows.name:
If you're getting those, might as well
assist the 2nd Decade with the Sand
Salmon collection. If it's no trouble!

rows.label: qst650314_msg0029
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] I fear my country lacks a
sense of discretion...

rows.label: qst650314_msg0030
rows.name:
So the 4th and 6th Decades
are the only ones capable of
doing their jobs, huh...?

rows.label: qst650314_msg0031
rows.name: ...Marvelous.

rows.label: qst650314_msg0032
rows.name:
Erm...we haven't
overburdened you, have we?

rows.label: qst650314_msg0033
rows.name:
Not at all! We'll have
it all done in a flash.

rows.label: qst650314_msg0034
rows.name: Oh, that would be grand!

rows.label: qst650314_msg0035
rows.name:
You have some exceptional Blades, Special
Inquisitor. Of course, it's to be expected
for someone of your station.

rows.label: qst650314_msg0036
rows.name:
Exceptional? Yes, he's
exceptional all right...
